string.text: Jobs: Find
Find
Work: include
Talk with your employer.
Work: kill
Find and neutralize
Work: return for a reward
Report on the implementation of the order to the employer.
Find sharper for: trophy 'Ingram Mac10'
Lively asked to find him captured weapons, the coordinates he left me.
Return to Hustler: trophy 'Ingram Mac10'
Return the captured weapons to the customer. Use can not be captured weapons. If there is no sharper to Skadovsk - need to wait for it.
Find sharper for: trophy 'AK-47'
Lively asked to find him captured weapons, the coordinates he left me.
Return to Hustler: trophy 'AK-47'
Return the captured weapons to the customer. Use can not be captured weapons. If there is no sharper to Skadovsk - need to wait for it.
Find sharper for: trophy 'Mossberg 590Mk.L'
Lively asked to find him captured weapons, the coordinates he left me.
Return to Hustler: trophy 'Mossberg 590Mk.L'
Return the captured weapons to the customer. Use can not be captured weapons. If there is no sharper to Skadovsk - need to wait for it.
Find sharper for: trophy 'Steyr AUG SS190'
Lively asked to find him captured weapons, the coordinates he left me.
Return to Hustler: trophy 'Steyr AUG SS190'
Return the captured weapons to the customer. Use can not be captured weapons. If there is no sharper to Skadovsk - need to wait for it.
Important premise: find Kanev
To pass the parcel Kanevskomu - you need to find him.
Important premise: to give a parcel Kanevskomu
Kanev found. You need to give him a package from the Avenger.
Courier: pass the parcel Markovich
Accidentally met a stalker Petka Pechkin asked me to pass the parcel with a monthly fee for local savers Skadovsk. According Petka, Markovic pay 'travel expenses'.
Information search: find savers on Skadovsk
According to available information, saver on Skadovsk should know something about the collapsed helicopters. You need to search and find out - what he knows.
Important information: talk to Makovet-
From a conversation with Markovic became clear that one of the pilots survived. But where to find the pilot, is not clear. To chat with local breeders.
Important information about the sawmill to find an unknown artifact
According to unconfirmed rumors about the mill may be unknown artifact. These should be checked, inspected the territory around the sawmill.
Important: to bring an artifact doctor Makovetsky
Near the sawmill found an unknown artifact. You need to take it to the doctor Makovetsky, to be exchanged for information about surviving pilot.
Travel: to talk with a beard
Apparently, I need to get to Jupiter. Only now, as ... breeder gave advice - talk to Beard, owner of a local bar.
Travel: to go to Jupiter
According to Beard, the way to Jupiter knows the pilot - the only guide on the Skadovsk. We need to agree with him about the transition.
Trekking: walk with a stalker to Skadovska

Stalker Petka Pechkin asked me to deliver a parcel to Skadovsk by promising a reward. Fortunate coincidence - the inhabitants of the base may know something about the helicopter crashed. It makes sense to go it there. Stalker-Guide agreed to show the way.
Hike: reach Skadovska
I moved too far away from the stalker-Guide. But the label on the map PDA preserved. Rest of the way will have to do yourself.
Hike: reach Skadovska
Examined the corpse of a stalker and found information about some Skadovsk. Go there, or something ...
Hike: reach Skadovska
Stalker, who agreed to accompany me - died. The label on the PDA I have left, so you need to travel alone.
Reid: to meet with a group of 'Elbrus'
You must meet with a team of 'Elbrus' and take command of themselves. But first you need to go to the meeting place - for port cranes.
Reid: to gain a foothold on the hill
Base for the siege of bandits must climb the hill and take a position near the main gate.
Reid: to make the first shot
Elbrus squad waiting for my signal - it is necessary to take the first shot at the enemy.
Reid: Destroy Chapaya and his gang
You must find and destroy the leader of the bandits - Chapaya, as well as all of its protection.
Reid: get the reward
Mission accomplished - the bandits destroyed. Need to return to the Skadovsk, the Sword, for an award.
Shipping: lift case Monolith
Wounded monolitovets asked me to take his case to Pripyat, the leader of the group for the transmission - a cyborg. But first you need to pick up this case.
Shipping: carry case Leon in Pripyat
Wounded soldier 'Monolith' before his death asked me to deliver the case to the leader Monolith - a cyborg. Their base is located in Pripyat.
Shipping: to go to the cinema Prometheus
Leon gave me the coordinates of the base of the monolith. If the data is correct, then the base is located in the cinema Prometheus.
Shipping: case give security chief
Case be transferred to the leader Monolith - Cyborg through security chief.
Shipping: get the reward
Contrary to expectations, there were no firing. Moreover, the security chief ordered him to pay me a fee for shipping case. To obtain it you need to approach Mitrofanov, local merchant.
Credibility: go to the shops substation
Godfather bandits Chapa instructed me to deal with the traitor - the Jackal. According to him, the Jackal is located in the substation workshops. Coordinates he threw on my PDA.
Trust: find the Jackal
Shop substation busy mercenaries - they are equipped with a temporary base. Judging by their number, to find and destroy the Jackal will not be easy.
Trust: pick barrel Chapaya
Most likely, the Jackal is hiding in the trunk of his rucksack. Need to examine the corpse and pick up a gun.
Trust: include trunk Chapa
Mission accomplished - that the barrel is obtained. You need to take it to Chapala and get a reward.
Contact: Meet with connected
I received a letter from a coherent, which indicates the call; In addition, the marked point on the map - a meeting place. Need to check the designated area.
Cell: cell search SBU
The Messenger gave me the coordinates of the cache created by one of our agents. I need to check the cache.
Find Kochyubeya: flashlight with optics 'Messler'
Kochyubey asked him to find the lost light, the coordinates he left me.
Return Kochyubeyu: flashlight with optics 'Messler'
Return Kochyubeyu flashlight and get the promised reward.
Cardan anniversary: talk to Zhulyabskim
According to Beard, Zhulyabsky has information on the whereabouts of the coveted bottle. Need to talk to the dealer and find out where you can get 'Baileys'.
Cardan anniversary: find a treasured bottle

In Cardano, a local mechanic, birthday soon. In this regard, Beard wants on behalf of the public to present him a valuable gift - a rare bottle of alcohol. But where to look, he does not know. That is why he entrusted it to me. Especially because I gave up and thump stopudovo this bubble came unopened.
Cardan anniversary: go back to the Beard
Include 'Baileys' beard in order that he reined in the beverage birthday Cardano. For work performed Beard promised a generous reward.
Rush Order: talk to Le Havre
Chapaev said that Gabriel is going in the direction of Jupiter. You can keep him company.
Rush Order: find the binoculars 'Ranger'
Chapaev, the leader of the bandits on the Creek, instructed me to find a special army binoculars. The coordinates obtained, the task is clear - to look for.
Rush Order: return to Chapala
Army binoculars 'Pathfinder' found. You must return it Chapaev and receive compensation for the execution of works.
'The wave of mutants': talk with Noah
Go to the barge and talk to Noah. It seems that this psycho was up to something.
'The wave of mutants': get the sniper rifle
I should as soon as possible to get a sniper weapon. The wave of mutants will arrive any minute.
'The wave of mutants': take the firing line
Noah asks for her help to protect the barge from the mutants. Need to take a defensive position.
'The wave of mutants': keep the defense
Sniper position is occupied, now you need to keep the defense. Leader David defensive operation, should remain in zhivih.
'The wave of mutants': continue the defense barge
Keep the defense barges. Leader David defensive operation, should remain in zhivih.
'The wave of mutants': kill the controller in 'port cranes'
Seen from the controller port cranes. You must kill him.
'The wave of mutants' neutralize the controller on 'Shevchenko'
Seen on the controller Shevchenko. You must kill him.
'The wave of mutants': kill the controller about 'stalker parking'
Seen controller about stalker parking. You must kill him.
'The wave of mutants': talk with Noah
The wave of mutants failed. Need to talk to Noah.
Detachment 'Skate': find the passkey for helicopters
In results helicopter detachment 'Ramp' got burned all the electronics, all the doors are locked inside. Doors can be opened only with a key to access the backup.
Wisdom: get three books
Get it for Informants three books.
Wisdom: get three books
Get it for Informants three books.
Wisdom: get three books
Get it for Informants three books.
Wisdom: pass books whistleblower
Return the books and get a reward.
Antidote: pass antidote Chiropractor
Attributed antidote chiropractor on Yanov.
Antidote: return for a reward
Get the shipping fees antidote.
Reservoir Dogs: deal with Alpha
Eliminate Alpha which has ruined that a dozen individuals. The last time this clique anomalies seen in 'Iron wood'.
Reservoir Dogs: show Sword PDA leader Alpha
Alpha destroyed. The leader of the flash-drive found. We have to show his sword.
Diversion Alpha: Check the appointed meeting place

According to records in the PDA learned that the bandits carried out someone's order and is now waiting for them to reward someone in Ironwood. It would not hurt to check that it was for the commission, and who gave it.
Diversion Alpha: Destroy the enemies
Need to deal with them.
Diversion Alpha: Alpha search body
In the Iron Forest I had to deal with Alpha. It turns out that Alfa give orders bandits. But what is to me and to be seen. Now you need to search the body Alfovtsev.
Diversion Alpha: ask inhabitants Skadovska

It's obvious that the bandits something had to crank on Skadovsk. Probably, they have managed to smuggle explosives there. Someone should have noticed something unusual. You need to ask the inhabitants of the cargo ship, to see whether strangers lately.
Diversion Alpha: talk to Sychom
Beard told me that just now noticed strangers on Skadovse, two thugs with a sort of box. Perhaps in the box tolerated weapons and ammunition. Do not be amiss to inquire on this matter at owl.
Diversion Alpha: find the charge on the upper decks Skadovska

From a conversation with Sychom was clearly that the bandits left the ship without the box. And one thing it means that it smells like kerosene. We need to find the charge on the upper decks of cargo ship.
Diversion Alpha: talk to Cardan
Ask Cardan how to neutralize the charge.
Diversion Alpha: talk with nitrogen
Cardan appeared ignorant of such matters as working with explosives. However, it is advised to seek help from nitrogen.
Diversion Alpha: find Nitrogen radio
Nitrogen can collect for me spetsilno scanner to be able to detect the charges Alpha ustanovlennnye, as I see it, not only on one Skadovsk. He requested him to find a simple radio.
Diversion Alpha: Order of nitrogen scanner
Nitrogen transfer radio and book scanner.
Diversion Alpha: Wait until the order
Nitrogen is set to build a scanner. You must wait until the end of the work and pick up the scanner.
Diversion Alpha: Pay
Take the scanner at Ashdod, and pay him for his efforts.
Diversion Alpha: survey all infested items Jupiter Creek
Diversion Alpha: continue searching charges
Diversion Alpha: continue searching charges
Diversion Alpha: continue searching charges
Diversion Alpha: continue searching charges
Inspect all items infested backwater and Jupiter for the established charges.
Diversion Alpha: get the reward from the inhabitants of Janov
All charges successfully defused. Stalkers, which is no longer in danger, we would like to give me the award.
Diversion Alpha: get the reward from the inhabitants Skadovska
All charges successfully defused. Stalkers, which is no longer in danger, we would like to give me the award.
Find Novikov: a set of tools for working with detectors
Novikov asked me to get special tools for repair and modernization of detectors.
Novikov include: a set of tools for working with detectors
Novikov asked me to get special tools for repair and modernization of detectors.
Interception: get to the mercenary camp
Come to the camp of mercenaries, which allegedly held captive agent of the SBU.
Interception: to rescue the captive
To free the captive agent must neutralize all the protection of the camp.
Interception: talk with an agent
Start a dialogue with the captive agent.
Interception: to bring the agent to the station Yanov
To accompany the agent SBU station Yanov, because there safely.
Pilot: ask Nitrogen Driver
Get in Ashdod information about the pilot.
Pilot: go to scientists in the bunker
Go inside the bunker. Perhaps the pilot is still there.
Pilot: Pilot find in a bunker
Find the pilot and speak with him.
Pilot: return to Zaton

Information obtained, Sokolov gave a tip to Zaton, and said that he will give me the coordinates of the collapsed helicopter as soon as I find myself there. Find the station Yanov pilot and go with him on the Creek.
'Nominal weapon': go to the village Kopachi
Come to the village Kopachi.
'Nominal weapon': Check the attic
You need to see the attic of the village council - Gromoboya stunned there.
'Nominal weapon': show PDA Crow Stormbreaker
In the rucksack was discovered dead Monolith PDA with an unfamiliar version of the OS. Information on it is encrypted, you must give it Stormbreaker.
'Nominal weapon': to examine in cement plant
Stormbreaker was able to decompress the data on the PDA Crow. Among other things, it stores maps with labels of the cement plant. You must go there and find the nominal Vintorez.
'Nominal weapon': return to the Stormbreaker
Weapons found. You must take his Stormbreaker and decide what to do.
Protection tunnel: help stalkers

The wave of mutants is heading to the base group 'Dawn', intending to destroy everything within it alive. If you have a 'rassvetovtsam' help protect against villains - are likely to receive adequate remuneration.
Protection tunnel: talk with Nazar
Attack of the Mutant reflected. Need to talk to the commander of the grouping and get a well-deserved reward.
Night Snipers: go to bat
It is necessary to get a career and learn if there is someone.
Night Snipers: eliminate shooters
According to Neon on the territory were seen Career unknown villains shoot stalkers from an unknown weapon. They need to be destroyed.
Night Snipers: catch the fugitive
When stripping career of one bandit suspects managed to escape. As soon as possible to catch up with it and destroy it.
Night Snipers: return to the neon
Mission accomplished, the arrow cast. Neon promised a good reward.
Sally: escort scientists to mine
It is necessary to ensure the smooth passage of the research team to the mine. Professor Cooper is to survive.
Sally: talk to Cooper
The task successfully. It is necessary to receive the award from Professor Cooper.
Personal box: check your private box
Grouping 'Dawn' to give me a personal mailbox, it must be debit.
Night meeting: Meet with connected
Come to the territory of the helipad to meet with connected SBU.
Order Chiropractor: find Medkomplekt 'CCA72'
Medic from the station Yanov asked me to get a special set of medicines, which, presumably, can be located on the territory of the plant 'Jupiter'.
Order Chiropractor: deliver Medkomplekt 'CCA72' medic
Special Medkomplekt found. You need to take it chiropractor and get a reward.
Order uncle Yar: finding camera 'Suzanna'
Uncle Yar asked to provide a small favor - find a camera, lost one of the newcomer.
Order uncle Yar: return Camera 'Suzanna'
Equipment found. It is necessary to go back to Uncle Yar and get a reward.
Please Hawaiians: find case
Hawaiian, a trader from the station Yanov, asked me to find a lost case in Pripyat.
Please Hawaiians: carry case for Janov
Case found. You need to take it to the Hawaiians, to Yanov and get a reward.
Hazardous work: to clean the den poltergeists have little station

According to the leader of the group 'Dawn', near railway halt further in the warehouse Janov was found accumulation of dangerous mutants - poltergeysov. I signed a contract with him to sweep areas of monsters. You need to check the first point.
Hazardous work: to clean the den poltergeytsov in warehouse
Neobohodimo destroy all creatures will appear next to the warehouse Yanov station.
Hazardous work: follow the signal on the PDA
You managed to detect a weak signal from propadshey reconnaissance. Perhaps someone still alive. Provide them with assistance.
Hazardous work: accompany survivor rassvetovtsa to cover clan.
One of the scouts managed to escape from the mutants. Help him to get to his base.
Hazardous work: report to Nazar on the successful implementation of the mission
Poltergeytsy destroyed. One of the scouts saved. You can go to Nazar reward.
Lost Command: to meet with a group
Near the main gate awaits me group of mercenaries. To discuss with them the details of the senior operations.
Lost Command: follow the detachment
Follow the detachment of mercenaries.
Lost Command: clean up the perimeter
In the area of the checkpoint found a small cluster of zombie. It is necessary to secure the area.
Lost Command: to examine the second floor
You need to check the second floor - it stemmed from there last signal missing group of mercenaries.
Lost Command: get out of the building

Our unit attacked Controller. I was able to just use 'psihodelin' - it saved my life, but the guys are out of luck ... now they are brainwashed. Need as soon as possible to get out of the building. Note: The controller has an aura does not allow me to use my weapon.
Lost Command: talk to Molfarom
I managed to get out of the building, but the supervisor is still alive and dangerous. Need to tell the news Molfaru and take action. You may have to reassemble the squad.
Lost Command: talk with the senior squad of the new
Near the main gate to expect new group of mercenaries. Need to talk to their commander and strategize the upcoming operation.
Lost Command: get 'psihodelin'
To ensure the success of the operation, you need to get four drug packaging 'psihodelin'.
Lost Command: to convey drugs detachment commander
'Psihodelin' found. Need to pass it to the commander group of mercenaries, and he will give his squad members.
Lost Command: accompany the squad to the plant
To go along with a new squad of mercenaries to plant 'Jupiter'.
Lost Command: clean pritsehovuyu territory
It is necessary to destroy the supervisor, zombie, and the rest of the enemies.
Lost Command: Molfaru report on the implementation of
The task is completed, the supervisor and his victim dead. Need to talk about this Molfaru.
Strange Activity: clean up the hole around the cement plant
To protect the area from mutants that were dug near a cement factory.
Strange Activity: clean up the hole inside the plant 'Jupiter'
To protect the area from mutants that were dug at the plant 'Jupiter'.
Strange Activity: clean hole in the south 'Jupiter'
Find and destroy the hole, in the southern part of the neighborhood 'Jupiter'.
Strange Activity: clean hole near thef/A
Destroy the hole that nearf/A.
Strange Activity: report on the implementation Nazar
The task is completed, the hole cleaned. You can vozvraschatsya to Nazar.
Strange Activity: mop up the last hole about SAM 'Volkhov'
Found another hole. Need to destroy it.
Strange Activity: talk with Nazar
The task is completed. Now you can get a reward.
Unknown breed: to get a sample of an unknown artifact
Detect unknown breed, and a detector 'Seraphim'.
Unknown breed: show sample Herman
Attributed to Hermann unknown artifact.
Unknown breed: find other samples
Herman told the news that the number of such breed will only increase. To conduct a successful experiment, it is necessary to get at least six samples. One sample is already there.
Unknown breed: find four sample
For a successful experiment of scientists, to be at least six samples. Two samples already have.
Unknown breed: find three sample
For a successful experiment of scientists, to be at least six samples. Three samples already have.
Unknown breed: find two sample
For a successful experiment of scientists, to be at least six samples. Four samples already have.
Unknown breed: find the last sample
For a successful experiment of scientists, to be at least six samples. Five samples already have.
Unknown breed: return to the last sample
Give Herman missing samples.
Unknown breed: wait until the end of the experiment

The samples were collected, now, for their full research requires conducting a scientific experiment. Herman decided to conduct an experiment today. You must wait until the end of the experience, and then return for your reward.
Unknown breed: talk with Herman
Herman said that the experiment successfully finished. Need to talk to Herman.
Unknown breed: show samples of Herman
Attributed to Hermann unknown artifacts.
Spatial teleport: to find a spatial anomaly

On the General Staff have a new job. The command requires a speedy departure in the dark valley, to search for the missing agent SBU and some documents of national importance. Also received information that in the vicinity of Jupiter, there is a kind of spatial anomaly that can, with the right of its use, send the person to any location. Command believed that I could, with the help of this anomaly, to go into the dark valley. The rest of the way into the dark valley is not yet available.
Frustrated Caravan: to help
On the way to the base of the caravan mercenaries ran into a large psevdogiganta. They're about the vent complex. They need my help.
Frustrated Caravan: kill the monster
Deal with psevdogigantom.
Frustrated Caravan: choose the goods
Caravan to carry loads of valuable information for mercenaries. You need to pick it up.
Frustrated Caravan: surrender the goods Molfaru
Give the goods and receive a reward.
The attempt on the Jack of Diamonds kill
Molfar decided to become uproarious with his bosom enemy - jacks. Need to shoot him.
Attempt at Diamonds: Molfaru report on the implementation of
Talk to Molfarom.
Weak lighthouse: to find a hiding place in the factory

Mercenaries long ago established a hiding place inside the plant Jupiter. Whoever installed - has long been dead. Where exactly this hidden stash, nobody knows. GPS signal beacon on the cache is very weak. That it is necessary to load up on him closer. My task - to scour the plant.
Weak lighthouse: check cache
Cache signal detected. It is necessary to search the cache.
Weak lighthouse notify Molfaru
Stash found. It is closed. Need to talk about this Molfaru.
Weak lighthouse: hold teams to the cache
Molfar ordered to bring his guys to the cache. They know how to open the cache.
Weak lighthouse: return to base
Talk to Molfarom.
Scientific report: track professors
According to a coherent, professor disappeared near the river port. You must go there and find the professor.
Working paper: paper include coherent
Information is received, you now need to give it connected.
Science briefing: search premium cache
The command gave me a stash of compensation money spent.
Dirty Work: go on a signal PDA
The signal at the flash-drive indicates that the place of deployment Kasilova - laundry. You need to come closer.
Dirty Work: Kill Colonel Kasilova
Kill Colonel Kasilova. This is the will of the Great Monolith.
Dirty Work: to search the body Kasilova
In rucksack Kasilova political instructor must be a PDA with important information. You need to pick it up.
Dirty Work: return to the Commander in Chief
PDA Kasilova bring to the base of the monolith and give it to Cyborg.
Dirty Work: catch and kill Kasilova
Quietly failed Kasilov fled ... It is necessary to catch up with him and shoot.
Splash psy-radiation: to clean the area from the zombie
Instruments recorded a very powerful flash psy-radiation, which led to a huge number of zombie stalkers. Necessary to protect Zone neutralize at least four hundred zombie.
'Operation Volcano': will meet with a group in the backyard

Colonel Kowalski organized special. operation to destroy the clusters 'Monolith' in Cinema 'Prometheus'. I've been involved in the operation, and to start the operation I need to meet with a group in the yard.
'Operation Volcano': follow the party leader
The operation started, you must follow the leader specials. detachment.
'Operation Volcano': take a firing position
Take the firing line on the 2nd floor of the CCD.
'Operation Volcano': Destroy the clusters 'Monolith'
To shoot to kill, to eliminate the enemy.
'Operation Volcano': talk to the party leader
The transaction is completed, it is necessary to base vozvraschatsya - along with survivors of the group.
'Operation Volcano': report on the implementation of Kowalski
You need to tell Kowalski about the successful operation.
'Vaccine for bloodsucker': rasprosy of NG-7 Ozersk

The apartment is on the Pripyat me stunned bloodsucker. Oddly enough - I woke up and there was nobody around. I found a note in the place, it was said that bloodsucker needs a vaccine, known as drug NG-7, which is why he did not touch me. Since he did not touch me, you need to help him by going to Ozersk and ask for the NG-7.
'Vaccine for bloodsucker': purchase NG-7 in Ozersk
Ozersky agree to sell me NG-7, 5400. I need to buy the vaccine at Ozersk.
'Vaccine for bloodsucker': return to the past meeting place
I vaccine. You need to pass a vaccine that bloodsucker.
'Vaccine for bloodsucker': pick award
Bloodsucker left me a reward.
'Vaccine for bloodsucker': survey the room
Waking up, I noticed that I bought the drug NG-7 disappeared. Bloodsucker took what he wanted. In the note he said about the award, it is possible somewhere in the room.
'The Lost Explorer': get down to the overpass 'Pripyat-1 '

Not so long ago lost friend Garik - Miller, who by occupation was a Guide. Garik very worried about the fate of his friend, and as he now can not check everything yourself, outsource it to me. The last signal coming from the flash-drive Miller indicates that it is in the overpass 'Pripyat-1. You need to check the overpass.
'The Lost Explorer': find Miller
Miller PDA signal is still active, he comes from an overpass. You need to check the source.
'The Lost Explorer': save Miller
It seems that Miller captured. It is necessary to rescue, to understand the enemy.
'The Lost Explorer': talk with Miller
Melnik saved, you need to talk to him.
'The Lost Explorer': get back together with Miller to Garik
Walk together with Miller to Garik.
'The Lost Explorer': talk with Garik
Get rewarded Garik.
'Atonement for sins': find anabiotiki and living water
Need to bring 10 anabiotikov and living water, to atone for their sins before 'Monolith'. Need to look to the physician on the Creek, maybe he knows something.
'Atonement for sins': to help find a medic first aid kit
Medic Creek agreed to tell me everything he knows about the living water, but not just so, and for finding its universal kit.
'Atonement for sins': first-aid kit to exchange information on the living water
Give first aid kit medic, and to obtain information about living water.
'Atonement for sins': ask about water in Ozersk
Medic suggested that Ozersky can know more about it. Need to talk to Ozersk.
'Atonement for sins': found on the territory of the Oasis of living water
Ozersky says that somewhere in the territory of Oasis should be living water.
'Atonement for sins': bring the water of life and anabiotiki Cyborg
Living Water and anabiotiki found necessary to carry them cyborgs.
'Atonement for sins': find 10 anabiotikov
Living water is found, however anabitikov of 10 pieces I do not need as soon as possible to find them, and take a cyborg.
'Atonement for sins': talk to the new brothers
Living Water will help our brothers healed. They would like me to tell.
'Atonement for sins': fill the 1st cache monolith

Need to restore the caches and caches 'Monolith'. To do this, I need to put in the cache Macaire marked on the map the following subjects: 1) AK-74 and LR-300 or SPAS 12, and one store to the appropriate weapons. 2) batteries, or batteries for Handicraft Gauss Cannon. 3) Any first aid kit, any bandage, and a choice of anti-radiation drug or psihodelin.
'Atonement for sins': fill the 2nd cache monolith

Need to restore the caches and caches 'Monolith'. To do this, I need to put in the cache Macaire marked on the map the following subjects: 1) AK-74 and LR-300 or SPAS 12, and one store to the appropriate weapons. 2) batteries, or batteries for Handicraft Gauss Cannon. 3) Any first aid kit, any bandage, and a choice of anti-radiation drug or psihodelin.
'Atonement for sins': fill the third cache monolith

Need to restore the caches and caches 'Monolith'. To do this, I need to put in the cache Macaire marked on the map the following subjects: 1) AK-74 and LR-300 or SPAS 12, and one store to the appropriate weapons. 2) batteries, or batteries for Handicraft Gauss Cannon. 3) Any first aid kit, any bandage, and a choice of anti-radiation drug or psihodelin.
'Atonement for sins': fill the 4th cache monolith

Need to restore the caches and caches 'Monolith'. To do this, I need to put in the cache Macaire marked on the map the following subjects: 1) AK-74 and LR-300 or SPAS 12, and one store to the appropriate weapons. 2) batteries, or batteries for Handicraft Gauss Cannon. 3) Any first aid kit, any bandage, and a choice of anti-radiation drug or psihodelin.
'Atonement for sins': fill the 5th cache monolith

Need to restore the caches and caches 'Monolith'. To do this, I need to put in the cache Macaire marked on the map the following subjects: 1) AK-74 and LR-300 or SPAS 12, and one store to the appropriate weapons. 2) batteries, or batteries for Handicraft Gauss Cannon. 3) Any first aid kit, any bandage, and a choice of anti-radiation drug or psihodelin.
'Atonement for sins': fill 6th cache monolith

Need to restore the caches and caches 'Monolith'. To do this, I need to put in the cache Macaire marked on the map the following subjects: 1) AK-74 and LR-300 or SPAS 12, and one store to the appropriate weapons. 2) batteries, or batteries for Handicraft Gauss Cannon. 3) Any first aid kit, any bandage, and a choice of anti-radiation drug or psihodelin.
'Atonement for sins': fill 7th cache monolith

Need to restore the caches and caches 'Monolith'. To do this, I need to put in the cache Macaire marked on the map the following subjects: 1) AK-74 and LR-300 or SPAS 12, and one store to the appropriate weapons. 2) batteries, or batteries for Handicraft Gauss Cannon. 3) Any first aid kit, any bandage, and a choice of anti-radiation drug or psihodelin.

Monolith want to renovate your antenna to communicate with the higher mind - 'Monolith'. The main component of this type of antenna is a subspace relay, it was destroyed. After the death of spiritual leader Monolith Adept subspace relay location remained a mystery. All costs necessary to get the information about this repeater.
'Atonement for sins': to get more information about the repeater

I was able to get information about the location of the repeater. From the words of owl, the repeater can be located on the territory of the plant Jupiter, in the inner housing, and is rumored to weigh about 200 kg. Information may not be reliable, it is necessary to obtain information from another Informant, and compared to determine the exact location of the object.
